title: Theatres should be the new town squares not monasteries
text:
Celebrities at Mets playoff games Newsday 
Comedian Jerry Seinfeld attends game two of the 2015 MLB National League Championship Series between the Chicago Cubs and the New York Mets at Citi Field on October 18, 2015.... 10
